attributes.action: Stop the issuing passports without the EU  on them whilst we are still members
attributes.additional_details: The UK does not have the right to unilaterally deprive its citizens of their citizenship of the EU, without an Act of Parliament ratifying Brexit of which there has been none.
attributes.background: The issue of UK passports prematurely without membership of the European Union deprives UK citizens of their EU Citizenship rights with no legal authority
